description: This file defines a Flutter widget called NoteCard used for displaying a note with title, content preview, and date, along with delete functionality.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays note details including title, content preview, date, and delete button.

methods.name: _formatMillis
methods.description: Converts milliseconds since epoch to a formatted date string.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NoteCard, including title, preview, date, and delete icon.
